title: Open Social Links In a New Tab
description:
It may not be obvious at first, but it’s hugely important to have any external links (i.e. links that point to external websites such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.) open in a new window or tab. The main reason is that you want to keep visitors on your website wherever possible: if a user clicks on an external link that doesn’t open in a new tab, once they close that tab they won’t be able to get back to your website without typing your web address in again. It may even be that someone found you through some convoluted combination of clicks via third-party websites and now have no idea what your web address was!

It’s standard practice to open these links in a new tab, and we can help you to get that functionality.

title: Display Breadcrumb navigation
description: Breadcrumb navigation is a list of links that show a customer what page they are on, and all the pages that are "above" that page in a store's content.

title: Display Multi-column dropdown menu
description:
Do you have a dropdown menu with a large number of items? Such menus can be hard to navigate and even get outside of the viewport. The easiest solution to fix it is by adding a multi-column dropdown menu.

Please note that this is not the same as mega menu functionality, which can currently be achieved with an app.

title: Add Dropdown menu (second/third level)
description: Add a second/third level dropdown menu to better organize your store's navigation by grouping pages and collections.

title: Show Images in drop down menu
description:
Are you looking to make your dropdown menu more appealing?

A good way to do so is to add product/collection images next to their titles, as it provides a better representation of what awaits after someone clicks on the menu item.

We can also implement it in such a way that it allows you to upload custom icons for all your menu items.

title: Show Cart total price
description: Show cart total amount next to the cart icon in the header.

title: Show Custom Payment Method Icons
description:
The icons that show are determined by your store's payment settings, however, If you want to add or remove payment icons without changing your payment settings, we can do it by editing theme code.

Default icons can also be replaced with the custom icons you provide or we can create a custom set of icons as a separate small task.

title: Add Social Icons On Footer
description:
Linking to your social profiles from your website is a simple, yet highly effective piece of your overall digital marketing strategy.

Adding social icons to your store helps your visitors share your page which in turns improves ranking in search results and link building.

title: Get Custom Newsletter signup
description:
Email newsletters are a powerful tool for communicating with your customers, and adding newsletter signup to your online store lets you collect customer email addresses that you can use for email marketing campaigns.

You can have the Newsletter Signup form on the footer as shown in the demo or as a section on your homepage.

We can connect the signup form to your Mailchimp/Klaviyo account as a separate task.

title: Show Additional Link Lists On Footer
description: Enhance the navigation on your website by adding additional footer menus and links to help your customers browse.

title: Remove "Powered by Shopify" text
description:
Remove "Powered by Shopify" text from your store's footer.

Removing this text gives your store an authentic feel because “Powered by Shopify” can often lead people to believe that it’s a dropship business and they can find better deals elsewhere.

It also opens up opportunities to create an authentic brand image for your store, as we can replace it with a text of your choice.

title: Get Customizable Promotion Top Bar
description:
Get your visitors attention with this customizable promo bar. Promote free shipping, coupons or share important news.

Fully customizable!

  • Text color
  • Background color
  • Font size
  • Transition time between announcements
  • Add a link to each announcement

title: Get Rotating Announcement Bar
description:
Rotating promo bar allows you to have multiple announcements. Promote free shipping, coupons or share important news.

Fully customizable!

  • Text color
  • Background color
  • Font size
  • Transition time between announcements
  • Add a link to each announcement

title: Add Custom Cart Icon With Item Counter
description: This implementation will allow your customers to see a number of items in the cart without having to view the cart contents. We can use a default shopping cart icon or any custom icon you provide.

title: Add Search Icon (toggle bar)
description: Primarily, only a search icon appears on the screen, and when the user clicks on it the search form slides out, also known as the toggle effect. It is a neat effect that also saves space and allows users to focus on the content. Not to mention, this is great for mobile responsive themes.

title: Add Search Icon (popup)
description: Primarily, only a search icon appears on the screen, and when the user clicks on it the search form appears in a form of a popup. It is a neat effect that also saves space and allows users to focus on the content. Not to mention, this is great for mobile responsive themes.

title: Add A Floating Back To Top Button
description: The floating "Back to top" button allows users to smoothly scroll back to the top of the page. It's a little detail which enhances navigation experience on the website with long pages.

title: Add Sticky (fixed) Header
description:
Persistent navigation bars - or “sticky headers” - are now a web design standard.

Sticky navigation works best with retail, e-commerce and other types of ‘actionable’ sites – sites where the designer intends a specific action, such as a click to purchase a product. In those cases, sticky navigation has been shown to significantly improve the customer experience, as well as keeping users oriented and giving them more control.

In pages with lots of content and long scroll, navigation must be friendly and intuitive. Clear and understandable in-page navigation helps visitors make a smooth journey through the content on the page in a manageable way. While in the past this was achieved by ‘back to top’ links, today it’s sticky navigation that does the job.

On online stores using sticky headers, customers are able to see the number of items in cart and access search and navigation menu at all times and without a need to scroll, which impoves user experience and is proven to increase conversion rates.

title: Increase Urgency with Social Proof
description:
*** Alternative to Countdown Cart app by Beeketing ***

Show social proof that highlights the popularity of your products, and create a positive influence on them to make a purchase.

  • Number of people who are looking at the product
  • Number of people who have purchased the product

App-free solution - since we're integrating this feature directly in your theme, it ensures the best possible performance.

* This functionality comes with a basic styling, and custom styling would require an additional small task

title: Increase Urgency with Countdown Timer
description:
*** Alternative to Countdown Cart app by Beeketing ***

Show countdown timer on the product or cart page to create urgency and motivate hesitating customers to make a purchase before time runs out.

This widget can be displayed on all or specific product pages, homepage, cart page, and we can set up the timer in any way you like.

App-free solution - since we're integrating this feature directly in your theme, it ensures the best possible performance.

* This functionality comes with a basic styling, and custom styling would require an additional small task

title: Add A Featured Product To Your Shopify Store Homepage
description: Feature the product of your choice on the homepage. As opposed to featured collections, where multiple products are displayed, this feature focuses on a single product only, by showing it in full details.

title: Update cart on quantity change without refreshing
description: Avoid using the update button on your cart page and have the cart updated automatically on quantity change. This is done with Ajax, and it provides a seamless user experience.

title: Show VAT prices on your product pages
description:
If your government requires you to show prices with taxes included, but you want your international customers to pay less than the VAT-included price, you will need to show two prices in your shop. One price will be with taxes included for your local customers, and one price will be without taxes for your international customers.

Before we implement VAT included price on your store, you need to confirm that your tax settings are correct, and you can find instructions on how to do so by clicking on this link.

title: Show different description/size chart based on selected variant
description: Show a different description or size chart base on the selected variant.

title: Add "Remove" button on cart page
description:
While it is an important part of the cart page, some themes are missing "Remove" button under each product that's added to cart.

With this implementation, you get a custom styled "Remove" button under each product, for better user experience. We can create it as a button, text link, or as an icon.

title: Add Quantity selector plus/minus buttons (cart page)
description: Add quantity selector plus/minus buttons on the cart page for better user experience, as buttons allow visitors to easily change the product quantity, especially on mobile.

title: Select product variants by clicking their images
description:
Normally, variants are selected from a drop-down menu, however, customers tend to go through product images to find the variant they like, without making a selection from a dropdown. Once they add a product to cart, the initially selected variant will be added, instead of the image that they chose.

In order to improve user experience, you might want your customers to be able to select a product variant by clicking a variant image, and we can help you with that.

* This feature is recommended if you have 1 image per variant. If you have multiple images per variants, you can take a look at Display thumbnails connected to the selected variant task.

** We might need an additional task to make it work on mobile (swiping through images), depending on the theme.

title: Add Image zoom (Fancybox)
description:
FancyBox is a tool that offers a nice and elegant way to add zooming functionality for your product images. By clicking on the product image, a fancybox (lightbox) appears and allows you to see the image in full detail.

  • Mobile optimized
  • Swipe to navigate, spread/pinch to zoom in/out supported on touch devices.
  • Responsive
  • Hardware accelerated animations for better performance.

title: Add Donation feature to your cart page
description:
Allow your customer to leave tips or donations on the cart page.

You can choose fixed donation values and also let customer donate a custom amount. 

* This implementation doesn't work in a cart drawer or cart popup.

title: Display thumbnails connected to selected variant
description:
If you have multiple variants with multiple images representing each variant, then such a high number of images can make your product page really crowded.

With this implementation, you can organize your product page by showing only product images that are related to the currently selected variant.

* In order for this implementation to work, you need to update product image alt tags per our instructions.

** We might need an additional task to make it work on mobile (swiping through images), depending on the theme.

title: Add Featured collection carousel
description:
Display products from a featured collection of your choosing with a horizontal sliding carousel on your store's homepage.

  • Choose header text
  • Choose the number of products in a row on desktop and mobile
  • Navigate by using arrows, bullet points or touch swiping on mobile

title: Set Minimum order amount to checkout
description:
Are you running a wholesale store, or simply don't find small orders profitable?

This feature keeps your shoppers from checking out until their cart total reaches a minimum amount set by you.

We also recommend additional task that goes hand in hand with this one, and it's a modified version of Customizable free shipping bar - It would function in the same way, however, instead of showing how much is needed until free shipping, it would show how much is needed to be eligible for the checkout.

title: Show color variants as separate products
description:
If you have products that come in multiple colors/designs, it is a good idea to showcase it on the collection page, so the customers are aware that there are different options they can choose from. One solution is to show color swatches on the collection page, however, this implementation allows you to show color variants as separate products.

That way, customers would be able to see all the color variants on the collection page and still be able to change the selected color on the product page.

title: Add Dynamic checkout
description:
Customers can use the dynamic checkout button to quickly buy the product they're viewing. They skip the cart and complete their payment with the checkout method displayed on the button. The button dynamically changes to reflect the customer's preferred accelerated checkout method.

The button is displayed next to the Add to cart button and can be used to buy only single variants of a product. For example, a customer can use a dynamic checkout button to buy two red t-shirts, but not a red t-shirt and a blue t-shirt.

There are two different kinds of dynamic checkout buttons:

Unbranded - These buttons display Buy it now text. When a customer clicks an unbranded button, they skip the cart and go to the Shopify checkout.

Branded - These buttons show the logo for a third-party accelerated checkout method. When a customer clicks a branded button, they complete their payment with that accelerated checkout method. The following third-party accelerated checkout methods are available:

  • Amazon Pay
  • Apple Pay
  • Google Pay
  • PayPal
  • Shopify Pay
  • Venmo

For more information on the dynamic checkout button, please read this article.

title: Add Subcategories/subcollections
description:
Shopify doesn't allow nested collections (collection within a collection) which can be quite limited for many stores. With this implementation, you would be able to create a multi-tier category navigation, by creating a page with a list of collections that you choose.

* This task includes creating a functionality and providing instructions on how to create subcollection lists

** We can create up to 5 templates in a single task

*** After completing the task, we will provide you instructions on how to create additional templates on your own.

title: Get customization information for products
description:
Sell personalized products by allowing customers to choose customization options.

There are multiple ways of implementing customization options:

  • Checkbox
  • Radio option selector
  • Dropdown option selector
  • Text box
  • File upload (doesn't work with AJAX cart)

*We can add up to 3 customization options per task, and custom styling requires an additional task
**It is not possible to charge for additional options without an app except in certain cases. Please submit your inquiry for evaluation.

title: Add A Collection List To Your Homepage
description:
Feature your best selling collections on the homepage of your Shopify store with this task. Let your visitors find your most frequently browsed collection from the homepage itself.

*Implementing this section includes basic styling. For custom styling requests, an additional task is needed.

title: Get Infinite Scrolling
description:
Infinite scroll eliminates the need for pagination by constantly loading new products as a user scrolls down the page. The benefits of the infinite scroll are real. It can boost your time on site, increase page views and improve the user experience.

*This integration is for Collection pages only.

title: Add Product Image Zoom
description: When selling online, to make sure that your customers get the best view of the products you need image zooming feature on your product. With this small task add smooth image zooming on your product page without any code conflict.

title: Add Security/Trust badges
description:
Add a security badge designed by Shopify to your online store to establish trust with your customers. Depending on the color scheme of your online store, you can choose to add either light or a dark-colored Shopify security badge:

Security badge can be placed in your website's footer, cart page, or any other spot of your choosing. We can also use a trust badge you provide or design a new one as a separate task.

title: Add "Continue shopping" link on cart page
description: Add a "Continue shopping" link to your cart page that allows customers to easily return to browsing products after adding something to the cart. You can choose to add a link that will take customers back to your catalog page, back to your home page, or back to the last collection page that they were looking at.

title: Get Customizable Free Shipping Bar
description:
Consumers today expect free shipping to be available at retail sites as a bonus for buying multiple items. According to recent data, 88% of consumers would be more likely to shop at a site online if they were promised free shipping.

With this implementation, you can have a fully customizable free shipping bar on the cart page without the use of an app that could slow down your website.

Motivate your customers to buy more!

title: Add "How did you hear about us?" on the cart page
description:
Ask your customers how they heard about your store by adding a "How did you hear about us?" form field to the cart page.

One of the best things you can do for your business is to ask new customers how they found out about you. Clusters of communities exist everywhere. When you ask visitors where they first heard about your store or product, you can brainstorm valuable ideas to hack growth and learn where you need to be.

title: Add Delivery Date Picker On Cart Page
description:
Include a calendar on your cart page that allows customers to easily specify a delivery date for their order.

This implementation is intended to help merchants who are looking to book delivery slots. For example, a food ordering service.

title: Add "I agree with Terms & Conditions" checkbox
description: Add an "I agree with the terms and conditions checkbox" to your cart page that customers must check before continuing to the checkout. If a customer doesn't check the checkbox before clicking the checkout button, an alert popup will prevent them from continuing.

title: Display Instagram feed
description:
Display a customized Instagram feed on your Shopify Store.

  • Boost sales - Use your Instagram feed to inspire your Store visitors. Make them discover and buy new products they love.
  • Increase Instagram engagement - Expand the reach of your Instagram posts to your Store visitors. Get more followers and likes.
  • Keep Your Customers in the Loop - Automatically push new Instagram posts straight to your Store to keep your audience aware of brand new products and latest updates.
  • Mobile responsive and customizable
* Due to the latest Instagram API update, an app is necessary in order for the Instagram feed to work, and we can help you with choosing the right one and setting it up

title: Show Featured collection
description:
Showcase a collection of your choosing on the homepage with this fully customizable and mobile-responsive implementation.

  • Choose a number of products to show per row
  • Choose a total number of products to show
  • You can use this section multiple times, to showcase multiple different collections

title: Add Custom Swatches (connect products)
description:
Connect products with custom swatches, that can be simple colors or product thumbnails.

This functionality is best used when there are similar separate products, and you want to show that they are related.

title: Add Quantity selector plus/minus buttons
description: Add a quantity selector with plus and minus buttons for better user experience, as buttons allow visitors to easily change the product quantity, especially on mobile.

title: Get Customizable Related Products
description:
With this implementation, you can add a section to product pages that recommends related products to your customers. This can help to boost sales, as it allows you to show your customers what kinds of similar products are available, increasing the likelihood that they'll find what they're looking for.

With this implementation, related products for each product are assigned manually, however, if you'd like to make it automatic and show products from the same collection we recommend checking out our related products small task.

title: Show Related Products
description:
With this implementation, you can add a section to product pages that recommends related products to your customers. This can help to boost sales, as it allows you to show your customers what kinds of similar products are available, increasing the likelihood that they'll find what they're looking for.

This implementation is showing products from the same collection, however, if you're looking to have full control over related products, we recommend checking out our hand-picked related products small task.

title: Add Videos to your Product gallery section
description:
• Embed videos to the product image gallery
  • Supports YouTube and Vimeo videos
  • Allows images and videos together in the single product gallery

title: Show Next/Prev Product
description: Add next/previous links to your product page. In this way, you will be able to navigate through the different products of each collection.

title: Get Product Labels (New In, Only few left, Sale, Sold out)
description:
Add visually-appealing labels (badges) to product images and display them in both product and collection page:

  • New In
  • Sale
  • Sold Out
  • Low Stock (Only Few Left)
  • Only # Left (below a specified amount)
  • Hot
  • % Off
  • Coming Soon
  • Limited Release

Multiple different shapes and fully customizable:

  • Rectangle
  • Square
  • Circle
  • Ribbon
  • Oval
  • Starburst
  • Badge Ribbon
  • Parallelogram
  • Arrow Pointer

Choose text color, background color, and position.
Product labels can show automatically or to be controlled with tags.

We can implement up to 4 different labels per task. Please choose which labels to implement when submitting a task in order to avoid delay.

title: Get Quantity & Add To Cart Button On Collection Page
description: By implementing add to cart button on a collection page, you will allow customers to make a quick purchase directly from a collection page, without opening product details.

title: Add Collection Page Banner
description: Show featured collection image as a collection banner above products, and improve the visual experience of your collection pages.

title: Show Product Page Description Accordion
description:
Use product description accordion to display more information in a convenient, user-friendly way.

With this implementation, you can show unique accordions for each content (for example: ingredients, specification, etc.), fixed across all the products (reviews, shipping information, etc), or combination of two.

There are two ways accordion can work:

  • Allow only one active (opened) accordion
  • Allow multiple active accordions

title: Add Shipping Calculator On Cart Page
description: Help customers to estimate their shipping costs before completing checkout by adding a shipping rates calculator to the cart page of your online store.

title: Collect Customer Notes On Cart Page
description: You can use order notes to collect special instructions from customers about how to prepare and deliver an order, and we provide an option of creating an additional field, that allows you to collect more options from your customers.

title: Offer Gift Wrapping Option On Cart Page
description:
This feature will enable you to offer gift wrapping service to your customers on the cart page of your online store. For customers who want their order wrapped, you can charge either a flat rate, or charge on a per product basis.

We can also create an option for multiple types (variants) of gift wrapping as a separate small task.

title: Show Product description tabs
description:
Use product tabs to display more information in a convenient, user-friendly way.

With this implementation, you can show unique tabs for each content (for example, ingredients, specification, etc.), fixed tabs across all the products (reviews, shipping information, etc), or combination of two.

title: Get Size Chart Popup
description:
Small, medium, and large: These sizes can vary widely when it comes to actual fit, and that can be a significant challenge if you sell clothing.
The problem is that whether you sell apparel with more generic or even numerical sizes (2,4,6, or 38 waist, etc.), none of them are completely standardized.

Having a size chart is the best way to resolve the problem, and it can help with conversions, since customers are more likely to buy when they are sure the product would fit.

title: Change Image on Mouse Hover
description:
When the mouse hovers over a product image it will display the second product image you uploaded for that product.
When the mouse is moved off of the product image the image will change back to the first image uploaded.

This feature is used when you want to display more than one product image on the collection page, and perfect if you want to display front and back images of clothing for example.

title: Get Collection Swatches
description:
The best way to show that your products come in multiple color variants are collection color swatches. Aside from showcasing all the colors as swatches, it is possible to update the main image on mouse hover/click, and we can implement it as an additional small task.

With this implementation, you would be able to upload images that would be used as color swatches, representing the exact color, texture or pattern of each color variant

title: Get Product Swatches
description:
Swatches provide an alternate way to display the selection of options for products with multiple variants. Rather than choosing an option from a drop-down list, customers can make their selection by clicking a swatch, which improves user experience, especially on mobile, and it's visually appealing.

With this implementation, you would be able to upload images that would be used as color swatches, representing the exact color, texture or pattern of each color variant.

title: Add Logo List
description:
The logo list section is, at its core, a row of small images with space between them that go from one side of the page to the other, and here are some examples of how you can use it:

  • Partner logos: Feature the logos of partner companies, manufacturers or companies. Link to their sites so customers can find out more about them.
  • Brand or designer logos: Showcase your top or most requested brands or designers and link each one to a collection or page with more information about that brand or designer.
  • Press mentions: Add logos of publications or broadcast programs that have featured your company. Link each logo to the article on the media outlet’s site or a screenshot of the article hosted on your own Shopify page. Popular section titles for this type of usage are “Featured in” or “As seen on”, etc.
  • Promotions: Feature current sales with small images that describe each one (such as “70% off” in a starburst or bubble). Link each image to the collection or relevant product.
  • Awards: Show the logos or seals of various awards you’ve been honored with. Link each one to the organization or a blog post about the award.
  • Memberships: Showcase the professional or industry organizations you belong to. Link each one to the organization’s website or a blog post announcing your membership.
  • Meet the team: upload images of each of your staff members and link each of these to their own profile page (or link all of them to your About Us page).
  • Certifications: If your products are certified organic, non-GMO, gluten-free, handmade or another unique characteristic, upload images of the certification seal (or make your own) and link each one to a page that gives users more information about what the certification means.

title: Get Testimonial Carousel section
description:
Prove the value of what you have to offer, by showcasing testimonials from your happy customers with a horizontal sliding carousel.

Testimonial carousel section serves as a platform to show off how others have benefited from your product or service, making it a powerful tool for establishing trust and encouraging potential buyers to take action.

title: Get Testimonials section
description:
Prove the value of what you have to offer, by showcasing testimonials from your happy customers.

Testimonial section serves as a platform to show off how others have benefited from your product or service, making it a powerful tool for establishing trust and encouraging potential buyers to take action.

title: Show only 1 left in stock
description:
With this feature, a sense of urgency is created which helps to increase conversions.

Aside from this exact feature, it is possible to use any other number, or a simple "Low stock/Only a few left" notification.

This notification/warning can be displayed as a text or label/badge in the product image corner.

title: Show available in size/color
description:
With this feature, customers will be able to see that your products comes in multiple sizes/colors/variants, without opening a product page.

There are multiple ways to showcase product variants, and here are some of them:

  • Simple text
  • Labels/Badges, with a solid background
  • Showing available options on mouse hover

title: Set up the ONE—Upsell, Email, Pop Up, SMS app
meta_title: Set up the ONE—Upsell, Email, Pop Up, SMS app
description:
You just chose the ONE—Upsell, Email, Pop Up, SMS app to increase conversions on your Shopify store, but need a little help setting it up? Let us help you. 

Our team can cover the initial app installation and setup, adjusting all its settings and its design to match that of your website.

title: Warehouse theme customization
description:
Shopify is a very powerful and extremely flexible eCommerce platform that allows you to set your store exactly how you had envisioned it. Although many of the Shopify themes are packed with useful features which will help you to achieve a more customized look, certain tweaks would require the help of professionals specialized in HTML and CSS, as well as the Shopify templating language-Liquid.

Our Shopify developers can assist you with customizing your store to achieve the exact look and functionalities that your brand requires.


 Who is this for?

Shopify merchants who are looking to optimize their Shopify Warehouse theme and include all of the configurations, customizations and tools which will help them achieve their sales and revenue goals as efficiently as possible.


 What do we offer?

The Warehouse theme is extremely flexible and enables you to change a lot of things if required. When it comes to its customization there is no one-size-fits-all approach since every store sets its own branding and conversion goals.

Here are a few examples of the customizations we can implement to help you create a conversion-driven store and the average amount of hours each customization usually requires:

  • Build a cross-sell functionality in the cart page/ drawer
    The project starts at 3 hours, depending on the functionality
  • Create a reorder functionality in the account page
    The project usually requires 3 hours
  • Add a separate quantity selector for each variant
    The project usually requires 3 hours
  • Add a sticky add to cart button that appears on scroll 
     The project usually requires 2-3 hours, depending on the design
  • Include a quantity and add to cart button on collection pages 
     The project usually requires 3 hours

Requirements

  • Admin access to your Shopify store.
  • Shopify Warehouse Theme Installation
     It's important that the premium theme is purchased and not in a trial mode, because trial mode doesn't allow any code changes


Outcome

Customized Shopify Warehouse theme that suits your store’s needs and matches your business goals. (edited)

title: Add Shop Pay Installments banners to your theme
meta_title: Add Shop Pay Installments banners to your theme
description:
This project is usually quoted for 2 hours, at a rate of $85/hour. We will add the product page and cart banners to your published Shopify theme. These banners will have the default styling and it’s not possible to make custom changes to the text. 

Why the banners are important

Buyers are more likely to abandon carts if they don’t see messaging that their preferred payment method is available. These banners let your customers know that Shop Pay Installments is available on your store before they check out through Shop Pay. Shopify stores that show the product page banner see an increased average order value and 55% more installments orders compared to stores without it.

Your theme may already have the product page banner

As of January 2022, the latest versions of all themes from the Shopify Themes Store already include the product page banner. Before requesting help, please check whether your theme already has the banner. To do so, activate Shop Pay Installments in your Shopify Payments settings and then visit one of your product pages. If the banner isn’t there, please proceed with this request.

Note: the cart banner is not yet included by default in any Shopify themes. If your theme already has the product page banner but you would also like the cart banner, please proceed with this request.


Additional resources

At this time, Shop Pay Installments is only available to merchants in the United States who sell in USD, and have Shopify Payments and Shop Pay enabled. The banner will only appear if Shop Pay Installments is turned on in your Shopify Payments settings.

For more information about Shop Pay Installments, please visit Shopify’s Help Center or contact Shopify Support.
meta_description: Buyers are more likely to abandon carts if they don’t see messaging that their preferred payment method is available.

title: Fix Stretched Images
description:
When an image’s aspect ratio is off, sometimes it gets stretched. This can make your products look odd and unappealing. Even more alarming, it can raise questions about the store’s general integrity. Don’t let this issue “stretch” on any longer!

How Will This Improve Your Store?

Pictures are your visitors’ best glimpse into your products, so you want them to really shine. Fix the aspect ratio and you’ll also enhance the overall look of your store.

title: Fix Gaps on Collection Pages
description: Collection pages are great for customers who are looking for a certain category of products. When not all of the products on the page have the same height, though, white space can appear between them. We can get rid of these gaps so visitors don’t think they’re missing products. How Will This Improve Your Store? Taking care of the blanks on your collection pages will give your store a cleaner look. Visitors will be more confident in your collection, because they won’t wonder if the empty space means products are mysteriously absent.

title: Fix Wrong Variant Adding to Cart
description:
Do you find that the wrong variant sometimes gets added to the cart? This issue is no joke, because it can cause a lot of headaches for you and your customers both! Luckily, we can help you fix it in a snap.

How Will This Improve Your Store?

No one wants to click “Add to Cart” on a size small green sweatshirt and see an XL red one in their cart. Fixing this problem right away will decrease frustration for your customers and save you from unnecessary extra work

title: Fix Inaccurate Variant SKUs
description:
SKUs are a sure way to identify products—unless, of course, a bug gets in the way. If the SKUs are not updating for each variant, they’re not doing any good. We can make sure each variant’s true SKU is always displayed.

How Will This Improve Your Store?

Sometimes it can seem like there are a million details to keep track of, but they all add up. Improving accuracy will both increase your store’s credibility and help it run more smoothly.

title: Fix wrong variant image from showing
description:
What’s more confusing than clicking on “red” when, say, shopping for shoes, and seeing a blue pair on your screen? It’s certainly concerning when the image doesn’t update with a variant change, but we can ensure the correct picture displays for each variant in no time.

How Will This Improve Your Store?

It’s critical that customers get the chance to see each variant before making their purchase decisions. Fixing this bug will give visitors the full picture for each option and show off your store’s variety.

title: Fix Inaccurate Variant Prices
description:
Different variants can have different prices for many reasons. Unfortunately, sometimes the price doesn’t update from variant to variant. This can be super confusing for customers, and it’s important to fix ASAP.

How Will This Improve Your Store?

Accurate pricing is crucial for shoppers and merchants alike. By ensuring your prices are up-to-date and correct for each variant, you’ll build trust with your customers and reduce errors.

title: Make Variant Selection Mandatory
description:
Most online shoppers have had the unfortunate experience of opening up their new purchase only to find it’s not quite what they expected. Often, this is because they didn’t look closely at which size, color, or other variation they ordered. Forcing customers to select an option before adding a product to their cart can stop this from happening.

How Will This Improve Your Store?

Making sure customers are ordering what they really want clearly increases customer satisfaction. It’s also more efficient for you, because you can be confident your customers’ orders are right the first time. Save time and effort on both ends!

title: Disable Sold-Out Variants
description:
It’s inevitable—at some point, one product variant or another will be sold out. It could be the most popular size or an especially attractive color. Crossing out the sold-out options or hiding them from view altogether will make it obvious which of your products are currently available for purchase.

Making it crystal clear which product variants are in stock will help prevent confused and disappointed customers. This way, you can emphasize the products that are available, while ensuring visitors don’t set their hearts on one they can’t have right now.

Who is this for
Shopify merchants who want their stores to accurately represent the available inventory and therefore avoid misleading the customers. 

What do we offer
Our team can tweak your theme to completely hide the sold out products, cross them out or grey them out, in order to visibly show your shoppers it's unavailable at that moment.

Outcome
This implementation will be available for all your current and future products that are sold out and it would work based on the inventory of your products, which means every time your inventory for a product is 0, the product/variant will be hidden or crossed out.

title: Add Floating "Add to Cart" Button
description:
If you have some product pages with long descriptions or multiple sections, the “add to cart” button can easily get buried. Putting in a floating “add to cart” top bar, which will appear as visitors scroll down, ensures customers can easily make a purchase wherever they are on the page.

How Will This Improve Your Store?

Convenience is key for online shoppers. Now, when visitors read all the way through the product description and then decide the item is a must-have, they can buy the specific variant they want with zero hassle.

* This task might require an additional task credit depending on the design and initial variant setup. The femo link is just an example.

description:
Hide prices and add to cart button for not authorized (not logged) users.

title: Get consent for promotional emails
description:
Sending newsletters, promotional emails to your customers is essential to increasing the store conversion rate. However, it is also important to first get consent, which, in some countries, is mandatory. Adding a checkbox to your customer account creation form lets your customers indicate whether they want to receive marketing material from your store and makes your store compliant with some countries' laws.


Who is this for?

The feature is intended for any store that is working or trying to break into an international marketplace.


What we can do for you?

While it is advisable to keep the same layout for all customers, it is also possible to show this feature only to select countries where the feature is mandatory by law. Note that the additional functionality request should be discussed before submitting a task.


Requirements


  • Collaborator access to your store
  • Access to the Themes section of the store
  • Access to the Customer section of the store

Outcome

We will integrate a checkbox field into your customer account creation form. Your customer will be able to give you explicit consent on whether they wish to receive promotional marketing from your store, which will be visible in your admin, Customer section.

title: Get Newsletter Popup
description:
The purpose of a popup is to provide a very strong call-to-action. This action might be an announcement or sale you want to the visitor to know about, but more often than not, it's to collect email addresses. Test after test has proven that popups work extremely well. In one test, popups drove 1,375% more email captures vs. a sidebar opt-in form. 

We can implement different types of popups:

  • Timed-Based - This method will show your popup after a predetermined amount of time. A time-based popup can work well if you set it to 60 seconds or greater, as you know at that point you are showing it to someone that's been engaged with your site for a while and more committed. 
  • Content-Based - Content-based popup will only show your popup on specified pages.
  • Scroll-Based - A scroll-based popup will show your popup when a user has scrolled a specific percentage of the way down your page. This is commonly used on blog posts and is similar to the timed method as you are only showing your popup to someone who has engaged with your page a specific amount. 
  • Exit-Intent - An exit-intent popup only shows when a visitor is about to leave your site. Using cursor tracking, the popup app will determine when someone is about to click the back or close button on their browser and show your popup in a last-ditch

 

If you're looking for a custom popup design, we can design it for you as a separate small task - Newsletter Popup Design
